problem.markdown:
1. In EDM, the applied pluses voltage is in the order of ( ) 50V DC ( ) 10V AC (x) 100V DC ( ) 30V DC
2. The working pulsing frequency in EDM is of the order ( ) 50-200 Hz ( ) 200- 1000 Hz ( ) 50- 200 KHz (x) 200-500 KHz
3. The working pulsing frequency in WEDM is of the order (x) 50- 200 KHz ( ) 200- 1000 Hz ( ) 200-500 KHz ( ) 50-200 Hz
4. In Micro-EDM, the pulsing frequency is of the order ( ) 500-5000 KHz ( ) 50- 200 KHz (c) 1 -5 MHz ( ) 200-500 KHz
5. Can we take similar thermal modes for laser beam or electron beam heating? ( ) No (x) Yes ( ) Either of them ( ) Yes with Modifications
